Welcome to SPARC’s documentation!

SPARC (Smart Potential with Atomistic Rare Events and Continuous Learning) is a Python package that implements an active learning workflow for developing accurate machine learning potentials.

Features

  • Ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) using VASP

  • Machine learning potential training with DeepMD-kit

  • Deep Potential Molecular Dynamics (DPMD) simulations

  • Active learning for continuous model improvement

  • Enhanced sampling with PLUMED integration

Requirements

Core Dependencies:

  • Python 3.xx

  • DeepMD-kit 2.2.10

  • ASE (Atomic Simulation Environment)

  • VASP (for DFT calculations)

  • PLUMED (for enhanced sampling)

  • MPI library

Python Package Dependencies:

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • dpdata
